overview: Ran has been Managing Director of Netbiscuits for the Americas until May 2011 and has since been Member of the Advisory Board. He has overseen the company’s activities since establishing the U.S. office in 2005. He has led the dramatic expansion of Netbiscuits in the media and entertainment, publishing, ecommerce, travel and hospitality, and advertising sectors. Prior to joining Netbiscuits he founded and managed two technology businesses in the fields of satellite communications and mobile services. Before that he was Partner in the Management Consulting practice of Deloitte & Touche. Ran holds a Master’s Degree from Carnegie-Mellon University and a Bachelor of Sciences degree from The Pennsylvania State University.
